biography: Carlijn is a creator of artificial realities, a digital artist who paints with data. As a Synthetic Data Specialist, she generates artificial data that can be used to train AI models when real-world data is scarce, expensive, or privacy-sensitive. She is a master of generative models and statistical simulation. Her work is a blend of artistry and science, creating data that is not real, but is realistic enough to be useful.
